tweets.text:
Humans are pushing other species to extinction through hunting, over-fishing and cutting down forests and grasslands.

We have to change the way we fish, farm and forest if we want to protect the planet - and ourselves.

https://t.co/ldXrMYaIOL

tweets.text: Looks like the sunshine is back in the south east! If you‚Äôre out by our waterways, remember the ground might still be a bit slippery after all the rain. Here‚Äôs some advice from our friends @CanalRiverTrust on staying safe on towpaths. https://t.co/FOBz1PuDWn

The Field Team is still out clearing up after Storm Alex at the weekend. 

Today they‚Äôve removed trees from the tree catchers at Morpeth. 

Catching trees here prevents them from blocking bridges and restricting flow in the town, reducing flood risk. 

#StormAlex 
#Flood https://t.co/He64nZT3ND

To #Control #diseases must read are:
1. Three #Novel #Inventions of IVRI to #Eliminate Diseases in #Animals. https://t.co/MWjji05nsD
2. #Indian Disease #Disseminating #Research #Institute (IDDRI) https://t.co/ej8ulDaqCt
@balfourbeatty @EnvAgencyMids Another HDPE flap valve successfully installed. Helping prevent #flooding in #Derby. http://t.co/jGCom3zJn1

tweets.text: @PJennings88 @CleanIlkley @EnvAgency Extraordinary that @thameswater can get away with discharging raw sewage into a chalk stream for 3 days running. What‚Äôs the point of ringing the @EnvAgency? It‚Äôs responsible for allowing this behaviour from water cos in the first place. The agency should prosecute itself

Do you have experience in #NFM natural #flood management? If so, we need your help with a project that is looking at making the funding process easier. Tell us more about your experience with NFM funding in this quick survey: https://t.co/N8bYFaKQyn @slowtheflow_UK https://t.co/5ZUTW8Uf9G
Tune into @bbcsomerset at 07.30 this morning to listen to @SRACommunities talk about https://t.co/v2UJUkArt1. Book your space!!

@RussellB1ggs @TheLynnNews @Feargal_Sharkey @jamesowild @AngliaEnforceEA @WNGreens @N_Rivers_Trust @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @EmmaHowardBoyd The EA check a farm out on average every 263 years for contamination run off into streams and rivers ! Ie amount of farms divided by amount of farm visits.

If this ‚¨áÔ∏è was a Constable, people would talk about it for centuries... 

The #RiverWey at #Elstead in #Surrey 

Pic: @MariaHerlihyEA and team https://t.co/yEKqfJyLoe

This is the River Granta at Linton this https://t.co/54uSizynUe not sure why it has changed colour but Cambridge Water is doing work in Linton.The Environment Agency has been informed.@Feargal_Sharkey @AquiferChalk @Chilternstreams @RussellB1ggs @EnvAgency @Cambswater https://t.co/dYftCpy1eI

Just 6 months after admitting to 8,400 pollution incidents in court @SouthernWater still manage to top the 2019 polluter in chief scoreboard.

What's clear is the @EnvAgency has no control over this company and even clearer, it is now time for @Ofwat to revoke SW's licence. https://t.co/1KqXjd6XYE

Did you know the flounder is a common species of fish around Britain's shores and is the only species of flatfish in Britain that will enter into freshwater.

@EnvAgencyMids @ChrisBaingerEA @AnglingTrust @SevernUnlocked @severnrivers @LYR_Shropshire https://t.co/e7FkFpPZaw

tweets.text:
Day 57

The next environmental ticking time bomb will be toxic #PFAS and #PFOS chemicals polluting UK waters.

A regulatory vacuum.

When this breaks, remember you were told. 

 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News @jonsnowC4 @EnvAgencyYNE
RT @EnvAgencyMids: Have you signed up to receive flood alerts? Heavy rain is likely overnight, we‚Äôll issue flood alerts and warnings as necessary. https://t.co/h1Z4Dj7z4i https://t.co/GFj3mbrBtv

@NP_PC1604 @Northants_RPU @DVSAEnforcement @EnvAgency Great work! The importance of having dedicated resources - not only have you taken that death trap off the road, you've also safeguarded the public and the environment! üêøÔ∏èüêáüêÄüêÅ

We've had reports of sewage discharges around Aylesbury and Chinnor areas as a result of recent storm events. @thameswater and @EnvAgency are investigating but please be aware and if you see any signs of pollution call Thames Water 0800 3169800 or EA on 0800 807060

#Waterquality of English rivers has been a #hottopic.

The @EnvAgency has revealed a failing water standard across England, while @Feargal_Sharkey is set to launch a legal campaign for the water quality of rivers.

So, what's the real problem? Take a read‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/fToTHzDESj https://t.co/axcAm0xcCa

The weekend storms shifted the shingle at Pett, near #Hastings‚Ä¶

So we‚Äôve been down to put it back and keep land and sea apart‚Ä¶

Flood-protection isn‚Äôt just about hard walls and barriers‚Ä¶ 

Did you know #DavidBowie filmed his #AshestoAshes video at Pett?
